import React from "react"; import { Navbar, Nav, NavDropdown, Container, Form, FormControl, Button, Badge, } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link, NavLink, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { FaUserCircle, FaShoppingCart } from "react-icons/fa"; import "../App.css"; import logo from "../assets/eletrodinamica.png"; const NavBarComp = () => { const location = useLocation(); if (location.pathname === "/login") return null; const isProductsActive = location.pathname.startsWith("/TemporizadorDigital") || location.pathname.startsWith("/controladores") || location.pathname.startsWith("/EstadoSolido") || location.pathname.startsWith("/Carrinho"); const cartItemCount = 3; return (
Início Relés de estado sólido Controladores e relés industriais Temporizador digital Sobre {/* Ícones como itens de navegação */} {cartItemCount}
{/* Campo de busca à direita */}
); }; export default NavBarComp;
